text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A few days have passed since<n>Mejiro McQueen's
remarkable<n>victory at the spring Tenno Sho.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Our little team of one has grown at<n>last.

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
From the very first moment I saw<n>your elegance in motion, I
knew that I<n>just HAD to join!

text_block_list.name: Caring Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Sniff... Your victory... So stunning...I was, sniff... so mooooved!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I-I'm flattered.

text_block_list.name: Sincere Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
I want to give it my all and chase my<n>dreams just like you
did!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: B-by all means... Please do just that!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Seems like they were all drawn in by<n>your performance,
McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I know... but it's all a touch<n>embarrassing.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... How was that time?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Six furlongs in a neat eighty seconds.<n>No complaints here!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Six furlongs in a neat eighty seconds.<n>No complaints here!

text_block_list.name: Sincere Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Wooow! So this is what it means to<n>be a Tenno Sho
champion!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Oh, goodness! W-won't you please<n>give me some space?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Though, I must admit, I'm happy to<n>train alongside a lively
Team Sirius<n>again.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: We owe it all to your victory at the<n>spring Tenno Sho!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: We owe it all to your victory at the<n>spring Tenno Sho!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
To think that my own running would<n>have such an influence
on the team...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Still, we aren't in the clear yet. Let's<n>keep pushing forward,
as a team!

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: McQueen, can you teach me about<n>good running form?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Of course, I wouldn't mind at all.

text_block_list.name: Caring Umamusume
text_block_list.text: McQueen! How can I leave the gate<n>as deftly as you do?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Let me show you that right now.

McQueen, my tummy hungy. Won't<n>you treat me to some
carrot cake?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yes, that would be no problem at—

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Wait, who said that?! I didn't mean<n>that just now!
Duh, it's me. Yo, McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: G-Gold Ship...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
"Acquaintance" would be... saying a<n>bit much. She's more
like a pest who<n>won't leave me be.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Ayy, I watched the Tenno Sho! You<n>were as cool as ever!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Especially that part when ya used<n>your own body as a
shield to protect<n>your allies from enemy fire!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Nothing of the sort ever happened!<n>What kind of firing is
happening during<n>a footrace?!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
You don't gotta explain anything. We<n>know what we saw!
The running part<n>practically had me in tears!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
And that's why I came out here.<n>Figured you might be doing
some<n>more stunt practice!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I don't care if you simply watch,<n>just... Please don't get in
the way.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Okay, okay! I'll just zip it and watch,<n>don't worry!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Now, my good fellows, shift your<n>attention toward Irongut
McQueen, as<n>she enlightens us on how to down a<n>
furlong's length of wasabi rolls!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Oh, for the love of—

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Phew... Today was quite exhausting...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: The Tenno Sho really did a number on<n>your leggies, huh?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: For goodness' sake, you havedone a number on my patience.That's all.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Gold Ship has a point. You did just<n>finish a big race, after all.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
And I must start preparing for the<n>next. There's no time to
waste.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: My ambitions do not simply end with<n>the Tenno Sho.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Oh? One lifelong dream right on to the<n>next, eh?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Naturally! As a member of the<n>prestigious Mejiro family, I
cannot<n>fathom settling.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Besides, I also have a whole team of<n>racers to support.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: ...Tryhard.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Of course I'm trying my hardest! This<n>is certainly no time to
be fooling<n>around!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Heh, good to know. And glad you'll<n>be keepin' those legs
on the turf.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
All right, I've decided! You've got<n>another new team
member starting<n>now!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Huh?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
McQueen's efforts have caught the<n>eyes of many far and
wide. And<n>thanks to that...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Woo! Congrats! Not sure what you're<n>talkin' about, but
awesome!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
The team may not be disbanded, but<n>I'm still worried
nonetheless...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: While she has a point in that the teamwas assembled haphazardly, Igenuinely believe that it will be hometo true stars.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: While she has a point in that the teamwas assembled haphazardly, Igenuinely believe that it will be hometo true stars.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Because Sirius has Mejiro McQueen<n>as its guiding light.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Ahoy mateys! Weigh anchor and set<n>sail, Team McQueen!
